comments.raw_text:
STR:
 1. Load (or reload) http://i.imgur.com/FI2tz.jpg

ACTUAL RESULTS:
My X display flickers like mad for about 1 second, and ends up with firefox showing a black box where the photo should be.

Some small fraction of the time (maybe 1 out of 20 tries), this aborts my whole X session, and I'm dropped back to the Ubuntu login screen.

Happens in latest nightly* as well as in Firefox 3.5 & 3.6 -- so, not a regression. (or not a recent one, at least)
* Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux i686; rv:7.0a1) Gecko/20110611 Firefox/7.0a1

System Info:
  Ubuntu 11.04 x86 with Unity (the default)
  GeForce 8800 GT with Nvidia driver version 275.09
